mean_en: a system, especially in a society or an organization, in which people are organized into different levels of importance from highest to lowest; the group of people in control of a large organization or institution
sentence: There is usually a rigid hierarchy in most large corporations.
sentence_trans: 很多大公司都有严格的等级制度。
word_etyma: hier分层的 + archy统治者 → hierarchy等级制度；统治集团，领导层
